org.javautil.document.style
Class StyleImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.javautil.document.style.StyleImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Style
public class StyleImpl
extends Object
implements Style

A simple implementation of Style that provides bean methods for manipulating properties as described in the interface.
